page.title: 15THE ROLE OF THE CHURCH 2
page.content: The vicar is also aware of the need for his involvement in the secular activities of village organisations. There are normally three or four services every Sunday;two or three in Puddletown and one at St.Johns, Tolpuddle.The family service is the best attended.The congregations have generally increased over the last ten years.At the present there are 197 names on the parish role .There is very little variation in the size of the congregation throughout the year although they are particulaly large at festival times.His other duties involve attending weddings,funerals and baptisms.
